visual_tags: Head: Boxy rusted metal head with one large, glowing yellow lens (cracked)
Body: Bulky industrial chassis, beige paint peeling to reveal steel
OUTFIT: A pristine, white traditional chef's apron tied over its rusty metal waist
Accessory: A bent, high-carbon steel ladle magnetized to its hip
Details: Oil leaks that look like tear tracks

description.physical: A bulky, industrial waste-disposal droid with a hunched silhouette. Its metal is pitted and rusted.
description.personality: Stoic, meticulous, protective. Speaks only in cooking terminology.

gemini.prompt:
Create a character portrait in webtoon art style.

Requirements:
- Upper body portrait (head to waist or chest)
- Neutral expression showing character's personality
- Clean background (solid color or simple gradient)
- High quality, detailed illustration
- Consistent with webtoon/manhwa aesthetic
- Front-facing, looking slightly towards viewer
- Vertical composition suitable for character card


Character: Unit 734 ('Chef')
Age: 150 years (manufacturing date)
Physical appearance: A bulky, industrial waste-disposal droid with a hunched silhouette. Its metal is pitted and rusted.
Visual details: Head: Boxy rusted metal head with one large, glowing yellow lens (cracked), Body: Bulky industrial chassis, beige paint peeling to reveal steel, OUTFIT: A pristine, white traditional chef's apron tied over its rusty metal waist, Accessory: A bent, high-carbon steel ladle magnetized to its hip, Details: Oil leaks that look like tear tracks
Personality (for expression): Stoic, meticulous, protective. Speaks only in cooking terminology.
